text: Troy Michael Kotsur (born July 24, 1968) is an American actor and director. He is best known for his role as Frank Rossi in CODA (2021). He was nominated for a Golden Globe Award and won an Academy Award, BAFTA Award, and SAG Award for this role. He also directed the movie No Ordinary Hero: The SuperDeafy Movie (2013). Kotsur is deaf. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American movie directors Category:People from Mesa, Arizona Category:Actors from Arizona Category:Deaf people Category:Best Supporting Actor Academy Award winners Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:BAFTA Award winning actors
title: Troy Kotsur
